At Pathogen Balance we are only concerned about energy, especially the Energetic Resonances of Pathogens (ERPs) which can be identified energetically and defused by neutralising their energy. Defused ERPs can no longer create effects, inner balance is restored, you begin to Heal. No pathogens - no unwellness or imbalance. Pathogen Balance uses an innovative energy healing modality which incorporates the ancient technique of Radiesthesia, also known as dowsing, Homeopathic principles, the latest scientific discoveries and principles of Quantum Biophysics or simply referred to as vibration.
